title: Feedback Alpha Client 0.8
body:
* It seems that language filter is always enabled (regardless of the actual checkbox setting).
* Can't hide the champions list before lock in.
https://i.imgur.com/yqg6OOM.png
* Option to mute **only** the music.
* Reset previous search in the lock in step.
https://i.imgur.com/cRmo3nD.png
* **[Idea]** In the match report, change the overlay image used to indicate the banned champions for something like this:
https://i.imgur.com/ZuBJt1c.png



Edit: Added new and clarification of some points.
Recommended Anime: [New Game!](https://myanimelist.net/anime/31953/New_Game) <(^_^<)

replies.body:
We are working on adding more sound options. Dont know the exact timeline on it, but itll get there.
We know about the search field not resetting, also working on that. Should be fixed relatively soon.
I'm not sure what the third item you listed means.
I think they meant that champ portraits in the post-game report should be striked out for banned champions.

I want especially the first one!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
